globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Onar reluctantly shows you the ransom note, which demands the Aqualish come and make "atonement" for his Black Sun days. Onar sweeps the "dust" from his eye and boards his shuttle.

You don't let him leave alone.

The bouncer at the Andoan gambling den recognizes Onar. You sense long ago-earned respect, and fear, as the guard walks away for the night.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can interact with the door ({K} or {I}) to try and open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the cellar opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can interact with the door ({K} or {I}) to try and open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the cellar opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Scattering through the swamps you make a clean escape. Onar briefly introduces Bhota before disappearing with her for the evening.

In the morning Onar returns for duty, with what you think might be the Aqualish version of a smile on his face.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Onar Koma receives the “Haymaker” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Under heavy fire, you barely make it to the shuttle. Onar has to be restrained as he thrashes. 

Later, Onar tattoos three more marks on his wrist and swears vengeance for his failure.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
The door is fortified, but you start to work on forcing it open.

{-} Test {K} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the door is still shut tight. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the door for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Arrest
globalEvents.eventText: As you open the door, you see that makeshift cells have been dug into the walls of the basement.

entityProperties.name: Cellar Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the cellar is heavy and protected by multiple locks.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can interact with the door ({K} or {I}) to try and open it.

eventActions.theText: Mercenary goons are already waiting for you, their weapons drawn.
Locked behind the doors are several Aqualish, thin, but unharmed. One calls to Onar impatiently, yet obviously elated. "Took your time, my love."

entityProperties.name: Captive 1
entityProperties.theText: A tall Aqualish man is pacing up and down impatiently. This is Egir, Onar's old sparring partner and one of his best friends.

entityProperties.name: Captive 2
entityProperties.theText: An old Aqualish man is sitting on the crate, looking exhausted. This is Vizix, Onar's uncle.

entityProperties.name: Captive 3
entityProperties.theText:
A slender Aqualish woman is watching Onar with a mixture of amusement and affection. This is Botha, Onar's fiancee.

{-} During his activation, while he has line of sight to Botha, Onar may become <color="red">Focused</color>. Limit once per round.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked. During his activation, a hero can choose an adjacent door and test {K} or {I}. If he passes, open that door. Limit once per activation.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives. Captives are neutral figures.
{-} During his activation, while he has line of sight to Botha (the red captive), Onar may become <color="red">Focused</color>. Limit once per round.
{-} The mission will progress when a cell door opens.

{-} Doors are locked. During his activation, a hero can choose an adjacent door and test {K} or {I}. If he passes, open that door. Limit once per activation.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives. Captives are neutral figures. At the start of each Status Phase, Rebels can move each captive up to 5 spaces minus 1 space for each Imperial figure adjacent to that captive at the start of the Status Phase.
{-} During his activation, while he has line of sight to Botha (the red captive), Onar may become <color="red">Focused</color>. Limit once per round.
{-} The mission will progress when a cell door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Cell Door 1 Open
globalEvents.eventText: You force the door open to release the captive.

entityProperties.name: Cell Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the makeshift cell is improvised and doesn't look too sturdy.

{-} The door is locked. During his activation, a hero can choose an adjacent door and test {K} or {I}. If he passes, open that door. Limit once per activation.

globalEvents.name: First door open
globalEvents.eventText: Now that you are about to free the captives, you can focus on escaping. Through the back door, various escape routes lead away from the gambling den.

eventActions.theText: Be adjacent to the closest captive that is adjacent to the fewest Imperial figures.

entityProperties.name: Exit 1
entityProperties.theText:
Multiple escape routes lead away from the gambling den.

{-} When all captives are adjacent to an exit, the captives escape. Click "Captives escape".

entityProperties.name: Exit 2
entityProperties.theText:
Multiple escape routes lead away from the gambling den.

{-} When all captives are adjacent to an exit, the captives escape. Click "Captives escape".

entityProperties.name: Exit 3
entityProperties.theText:
Multiple escape routes lead away from the gambling den.

{-} When all captives are adjacent to an exit, the captives escape. Click "Captives escape".

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent exits.
{-} When all captives are adjacent to an exit, the captives escape. Click an exit and select "Captives escape".
{-} The Rebels win when the captives escape.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked. During his activation, a hero can choose an adjacent door and test {K} or {I}. If he passes, open that door. Limit once per activation.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives. Captives are neutral figures. At the start of each Status Phase, Rebels can move each captive up to 5 spaces minus 1 space for each Imperial figure adjacent to that captive at the start of the Status Phase.

globalEvents.name: Stop them!
globalEvents.eventText: More goons rush in to stop you.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent captives. Captives are neutral figures. At the start of each Status Phase, Rebels can move each captive up to 5 spaces minus 1 space for each Imperial figure adjacent to that captive at the start of the Status Phase.
{-} During his activation, while he has line of sight to Botha (the red captive), Onar may become <color="red">Focused</color>. Limit once per round.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent exits.
{-} When all captives are adjacent to an exit, the captives escape. Click an exit and select "Captives escape".
{-} The Rebels win when the captives escape.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Move Captives
globalEvents.eventText:
You usher the captives on.

{-} Move each captive up to 5 spaces minus 1 space for each Imperial figure adjacent to that captive.
